basics.name: Hariharan M
basics.label: Cyber Threat Intel Analyst
basics.summary: Experienced systems engineer with a versatile background encompassing IT and production systems. Focused on DevOps principles, I've been dedicated to automating, scaling, and optimizing operational efficiency. A fervent advocate for nurturing robust teams through a positive work culture, I'm deeply passionate about transparency, public learning, and continuous enhancement of both developer and user experiences.

work.name: Saptanglabs
work.summary: Led cyber threat intelligence initiatives, leveraging automation and data analysis to identify fraud, disrupt malicious networks, and protect brands from impersonation and misuse.
highlights: Helped brands safeguard their reputation by detecting brand misuse and impersonation through cyber threat intelligence and fraud analysis, enabling proactive threat mitigation.

Developed a Python-based automation tool leveraging Selenium, MongoDB, and Celery to gather intelligence on threat actors operating fraudulent betting and investment sites. This solution enhanced threat detection efficiency by 75%.
Uncovered 99,000+ scammer data points and 2,000+ malicious ad domains, disrupting fraudulent networks and collaborating with government agencies for enforcement action.
Monitored Telegram and the Dark Web, producing 20+ actionable threat intelligence reports to aid in cybercrime prevention and mitigation.
work.location: IIT Madras Research Park, Chennai, Tamil Nadu, India

references.name: Mike Dodge
references.reference: Gilbert is detailed oriented and one of the hardest workers I know. If you give him a task, you can be sure it will get done!

references.name: Simon Blackstein
references.reference: Gilbert is an awesome systems guy. He's had to come up to speed with managing Linux and Windows infrastructure over the last few years, and has definitely exceeded my expectations by becoming a reasonable coder where he needs to. Gilbert isn't afraid of anything as far as I can tell - taken on chef recipes, Citrix support and working with me on a corporate REST API written in PowerShell. He can pretty much take on anything he sets his mind to.

references.name: Nicholas Whiston
references.reference: In my work with Gilbert I've found him to possess a strong combination of technical savvy and interpersonal skills. He's knowledgeable but also approachable, making him a valuable team member. Gilbert is detail-oriented and committed, working hard to finish tasks under pressure and delivering exceptional results.

references.name: Wesley Whetstone
references.reference: This dude to be frank is a bad ass at anything he touches computer wise. Would love to work with this guy soon.
